title: 1907 Detroit Tigers RPPC w/ Cobb in rookie year
author: T206Jim

posts.post_title: 1907 Detroit Tigers RPPC w/ Cobb in rookie year
posts.post_content:
RPPC produced in 1907 and postmarked in 1908 depicting the Tigers team on the cusp of the 1907 World Series.  Beautiful sepia toning and a classic Cobb stare.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=336136&d=1543765947[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=336137&d=1543765963[/IMG]

No longer available.
